1.text: After this I looked and saw a door standing open in heaven. And the voice I had previously heard speak to me like a trumpet was saying, “Come up here, and I will show you what must happen after these things.”

2.text: At once I was in the Spirit, and I saw a throne standing in heaven, with someone seated on it.

3.text: The One seated there looked like jasper and carnelian, and a rainbow that gleamed like an emerald encircled the throne.

4.text: Surrounding the throne were twenty-four other thrones, and on these thrones sat twenty-four elders dressed in white, with golden crowns on their heads.

5.text: From the throne came flashes of lightning, rumblings, and peals of thunder. Before the throne burned seven torches of fire. These are the seven spirits of God.

6.text: And before the throne was something like a sea of glass, as clear as crystal. In the center, around the throne, were four living creatures, covered with eyes in front and back.

7.text: The first living creature was like a lion, the second like a calf, the third had a face like a man, and the fourth was like an eagle in flight.

8.text: And each of the four living creatures had six wings and was covered with eyes all around and within. Day and night they never stop saying: “Holy, Holy, Holy, is the Lord God Almighty, who was and is and is to come!”

9.text: And whenever the living creatures give glory, honor, and thanks to the One seated on the throne, who lives forever and ever,

10.text: the twenty-four elders fall down before the One seated on the throne, and they worship Him who lives forever and ever. They cast their crowns before the throne, saying:

11.text: “Worthy are You, our Lord and God, to receive glory and honor and power, for You created all things; by Your will they exist and were created.”
